title: Review Environmental Monitoring Data
description: A microbiologist must review environmental monitoring data from a sterile manufacturing area to ensure it remains in a state of control.

tasks.description: Retrieve the latest environmental monitoring results (air and surface samples) for the Grade A cleanroom.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls the data from the LIMS.

tasks.description: Compare the results against the established alert and action limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that one surface sample result is above the action limit.

tasks.description: Initiate a quality investigation for the out-of-limit result.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new investigation record in the quality system.

tasks.description: Recommend corrective actions, such as enhanced cleaning of the area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds a recommendation to the investigation for a triple-clean of the affected area.
